attributes.action: More Disciplinary Rights for Parents, Teachers & the Police
attributes.additional_details:
After the riots over the past week the government the police and the public have focused blame towards Parents, teachers and the Police.

There are been calls to fine and prosecute parents for their children actions.

How can this be right when all chastisement towards Children has been removed, teachers cant do anything in school & the police are to worried to act.

Discipline and Punish needs to be restored at home, in school and on the street of this great country - and all the Do gooders should take account to the last few days of troubles to where we are now.
